bio: I'm a proud husband & father, amateur triathlete, community volunteer, & REALTOR at RE/MAX. I live, play, and volunteer in St. Albert and work wherever my Clients need me to represent them. I'm a self-proclaimed HIP* REALTOR which means *Honesty-Integrity-Professionalism* pervade all aspects of my business. http://rem.ax/1nacxMk University of Alberta B.Sc. (MLS) RE/MAX Professionals REALTOR(R)
